generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Block Components Entity Fall On
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Configures the behavior of an entity falling on this block. The minimum distance in blocks that an actor needs to fall before events are triggered.

fields.title: Min Fall Distance
fields.description: The minimum distance in blocks that an actor needs to fall before events are triggered.
